body.p: The Administration page provides access to critical configurations, such as security settings, and allows for uploading frameworks and plugins. Due to the sensitivity of these actions, access is limited to users with the admin role.
As a general best practice, avoid sharing the administrator account among multiple users and limit administrator privileges to only a few individuals.

By default, the application allows the administrator to access the Administration page using a username and password stored within the application. However, you can also configure authentication via an external service, such as Active Directory or OpenID Connect (OIDC).
